subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: David Ortiz hit his 50th home run Wednesday night to match a Red Sox record, but Torii Hunter’s three-run shot in the eighth inning sent the Minnesota Twins to a victory.
snippet: David Ortiz hit his 50th home run Wednesday night to match a Red Sox record, but Torii Hunter’s three-run shot in the eighth inning sent the Minnesota Twins to a victory.
